GMCM.Spawning.Name: Spawning
GMCM.BossSpawnPercentChance.Name: Boss Spawn Chance
GMCM.BossSpawnPercentChance.Desc: Adjust the percent chance of a boss spawning in each location. Note that a boss can only spawn once per day in each location.
GMCM.MonsterArea.Name: Mine cavern

GMCM.BossProbabilityWeights.Name: Boss Probability Weights
GMCM.BossProbabilityWeights.Desc: Adjust the probability weights for each boss type to control their chances of spawning. Higher weights amplify the chances of encountering a specific boss, while lower weights reduce their occurrence.
GMCM.BossSpawn.Name: Boss Place Spawn
GMCM.BossSpawn.Desc: Setting work only on monsters area. In open world all monsters will be spawn with boss spawn chance.

GMCM.Difficulty.Name: Difficulty
GMCM.UndergroundDifficulty.Name: Underground Difficulty
GMCM.UndergroundDifficulty.Desc:
The difficulty mainly affects boss HP and damage. It is determined by multiplying the base underground difficulty by the current mine level.
The formula is: BaseUndergroundDifficulty x mineLevel / 100.
GMCM.BaseUndergroundDifficulty.Name: Base Underground Difficulty
GMCM.OverlandDifficulty.Name: Overland Difficulty
GMCM.OverlandDifficulty.Desc: Above ground, the difficulty is a random value between the minimum and maximum overland difficulty.
GMCM.MinOverlandDifficulty.Name: Min Overland Difficulty
GMCM.MaxOverlandDifficulty.Name: Max Overland Difficulty
GMCM.Sprites.Name: Sprites
GMCM.AlternateTextures.Name: Alternate Textures
GMCM.AlternateTextures.Desc: By default, this mod uses the sprites of the monsters they are based on, scaled up. Enabling this option allows the loading of custom sprites.
GMCM.UseAlternateTextures.Name: Use Alternate Textures
GMCM.Dimensions.Name: Dimensions
GMCM.Dimensions.Desc: The sprite scale defines the size of a boss in relation to the size of an ordinary monster of the same type. Don't alter the width and height of the bosses unless you're using custom sprites.
GMCM.Scale.Name: Scale
GMCM.Height.Name: Height
GMCM.Width.Name: Width
